entries.description: SAM Invoke Webview: fix 'Show All Fields' causing a blank page
CloudWatch Logs: show a placeholder message instead of an error when no logs exist
Credentials: support for ECS container provided credentials
Credentials: Improved guidance during new credential profile creation
Added Getting Started walkthroughs to aid in configuring the Toolkit
App Runner: You can now create, pause, resume, deploy, and delete App Runner services within the AWS explorer.
New SAM applications come with toolkit-specific instructions
Apply JSON schemas to Cloudformation and SAM templates (must be named `template.yaml`)
